name: Square Next?
description:
Square Next is a frantic action puzzle game!
Complete the sequences before the time runs out.

Do you have what it takes to complete all three hundred sequences? It won't be easy, as there are multiple fiendish hindrances to put you off...race against time to hit the squares in the correct order before the time runs out.

Achieve more than 80% on a level to unlock the next.

Features:
  • 300 levels!
  • Increasing difficulty!
  • Educational and fun!
  • Random hinderances!

From the team that brought you Nubbles.

Developed by House of Sturgeon - houseofsturgeon.org
